name: Hand Made
description: Hand Made is a full service advertising agency what means that we have a knowledge of and we use many different methods of communication (mostly ATL, INTERACTIVE, BTL). Over the years we have worked with various brands: Volkswagen, Tyskie, Tauron, Hoop Cola, Lubella, Dulux, Vibovit, Hepatil, Arctic, to name but a few. We're one of the top agencies in Poland according to independent and yearly published ranking (Media&Marketing Poland and Kantar Millward Brown 2017).
